img_below_text:
Once it hits, he'll be knocked to the ground, the curse will be broken, and you'll get a massive opportunity to attack him with everything you've got! Still, don't expect him to go down without a fight after the stun wears off. He's got more tricks than ever, and is able to create huge blasts that can end the fight quickly if you don't react fast.

The image depicts a pivotal moment in combat from *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the protagonist, Wukong, is seen delivering a powerful attack to the Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master, who lies stunned on the ground amidst a field of yellow flowers. This follows the successful use of the Weaver's Needle Vessel to break the enemy's curse, creating an opportunity for Wukong to unleash a decisive assault. The game's interface displays various abilities and items, emphasizing strategic gameplay elements. The scene highlights the intensity of the battle and the importance of timing and preparation in overcoming the enemy's tricks and powerful attacks.
